lines.text: What's the matter? Didn't you use the book?
Yeah, b-b-b-but it didn't work.
Maybe you didn't use it right.
[spanks Butch with book]
It always works for me.
where the heck to put the kids while she's working?

You ain't kiddin', brother! I'm a beat pigeon. I can't find no one to mind my kid. The situation is supernatural. I don't wanna be an absentee, but what's a girl to do? I just gotta find someone to mind my Percy.
You wanna help the United Nations, don't ya? You want those ships and planes roll off the assembly line, don't ya? You want those Nazis and Japs bombed off the earth, don't ya?
I h-hate Hitl-Hitl-Shicklegruber and Toj-Toj...
Then mind my kid. Here, this might help you.
[Gives Porky a book]

[Reads cover]
Ch-Ch-Child Psychology.
Now I can go weld planes. We gotta have planes, you know.
[acts like a plane taking off, then flies off like one]
S-Say, she's a character.
And w-w-what's your name?
Butch.
B-B-B-Butch? He-he-he-he.
Not B-B-B-B-B-B-Butch - He-he-he-he. Just plain Butch!

[lands in a pile of pots and pans after Porky throws him off his finger]
Of course you know, this means war!
[Puts a cigar in his mouth and impersonates Winston Churchill]
We will fight until Hitler and his Nazi gangsters suffer disastrous, overwhelming and complete defeat!
